definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Archer - see if you are better than Willhelm Tell.
sentences.chinese: 看看你是否比羅賓漢強。

sentences.english: But the merry men preferred to call him Little John .
sentences.chinese: 但羅賓漢一夥把他的姓和名顛倒過來，改成了小約翰。

sentences.english: After a fierce fight, Robin killed Guy.
sentences.chinese: 經過一番惡鬥，羅賓漢殺死了蓋伊。

sentences.english: Already, she has been dubbed "Die Robin Hood Bankerin".
sentences.chinese: 她已經被冠以“銀行家中的女羅賓漢”稱號。

sentences.english: Hey, go play Robin Hood with somebody elses heart.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，你去扮演羅賓漢偷別人的心吧。

sentences.english: But we'll play Robin Hood—it's nobby fun.
sentences.chinese: 得了，我們來演羅賓漢吧，它好玩極了。

sentences.english: The city is famous for Robin Hood and has a University in Ningbo.
sentences.chinese: 該城市羅賓漢成名並在寧波有一個大學。

sentences.english: There stands a statue of Robin Hood with bow and arrow in the city of Nottingham.
sentences.chinese: 手持弓箭的俠盜羅賓漢雕像位於諾丁山市內。

sentences.english: The sheriff mistook Robin for Guy, thinking he had killed Robin.
sentences.chinese: 郡長誤把羅賓漢當做蓋伊，以爲他殺死了羅賓漢。

sentences.english: The sheriff mistook Robin for Guy, thinking he had killed Robin.
sentences.chinese: 郡長誤把羅賓漢當做蓋伊，以爲他殺死了羅賓漢。

sentences.english: The legend of Robin Hood is re-written as the BBC kills off the heroine in the Holy Land.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓漢傳奇隨着BBC在聖地殺掉了女主角被改寫。

sentences.english: Thank goodness old Robin Hood was around the help right this tremendously vile wrong.
sentences.chinese: 感謝上帝老羅賓漢及時出現制止了這一邪惡罪行。

sentences.english: One day, Robin Hood and Little John went together through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，羅賓漢與小約翰一同在森林裏趕路。

sentences.english: And why would Robin Hood want to rob them to help the poor?
sentences.chinese: 又是爲什麼羅賓漢要劫富濟貧呢？
